snippet: Michael Velez, 22,  was accused of driving the getaway car in a botched robbery that ended in the death of Officer Peter Figoski in 2011.
abstract: Michael Velez, accused of driving getaway car in botched robbery that ended in fatal shooting of New York City Police Officer Peter Figoski in 2011, is cleared of all charges after testifying that he thought he was just giving the other men involved a ride.
lead_paragraph: Michael Velez, 22,  was accused of driving the getaway car in a botched robbery that ended in the death of Officer Peter Figoski in 2011.

headline.seo: Man Is Acquitted of Murder in Robbery That Led to Officer’s Death
headline.main: Man Is Acquitted of Murder in Robbery That Killed Officer
headline.print_headline: Man Is Acquitted of Murder in Robbery That Killed Officer
